Use ggplot to plot functions

```{r}
fx= function(x){
  log(x)+ 10
}

ggplot(data.frame(x= c(1, 100)), aes(x))+
  geom_function(fun=fx)+
  theme_bw()
```

Partial derivatives of a function

```{r}
fxyz= expression(2*x*y + 3*(x^2*z^3))
dfdy= D(fxyz, "y")
dfdy
```
